name: Top of the Hill Cuisine Inc.

reviews.text: The BEST fried chicken in my opinion. One of many delicious Jamaican restaurants in the Northeast Bronx!!! Can‚Äôt go home without grabbing a meal to go!!

Let sme start by saying that the food is very good and the prices are pocket friendly. But whoever that light-skinned, bald-headed older guy is who opens the store in the morning, he's very rude and disrespectful.
I had the fried chicken and rice and peas. The ingredients were fresh and the meal was delicious! Definitely going back.
Food is good
Good jamaican food. Can definitely eat.
They pick and choose .. food is good though
The food was very good, but the staff will make you not want to ever see this restaurant again very rude no customer service good food and bad customer service. It‚Äôs a no.
Good food
Food was delicious,got a large curry goat, finger licking
Only restaurant I buy food in the Bronx for years.
Tried Stew Peas with Oxtails and White Rice...with a side of cabbage!!! AMAZING. So yummy. I will make a trip back again and again
People were friendly food is great. Been there three times. I stop there on my way to new Rochelle or Connecticut.
Food was great and the rest of the restaurant was good and blessed

The best oxtail with White Rice I've ever had thus far. Whoever the Chef is, I tip my Crown to youüëë You have a unique way of cooking‚ú®Ô∏è You were upfront and paying attention when you were being taught to cook by your AncestorsüòÅ
Good food even better prices üôåüèæ
Great cow foot and Rice and peas and Great fried chicken
The best oxtail rice and peas I have ever eaten, And the fried chicken rice and peas with brown stew gravy is off the charts. Keep up the good work guys your food is awesome
A beautiful place to go to and the food is great, this is the third time I've been there. Nice tasting Carriben food.
Food is always great. No pork is prepared there
Food is good and rich but a bit spicy.
Brown stew fish da bomb... Love stew peas.. Fried chicken to die for.. Good staff and crew
They're fried chicken and steamed cabbageThe best in the Bronx and customer service is excellent

Talk about the best Jamaica restaurant in the Northeast Bronx. Whatever is on the menu, it‚Äôs finger licking. Good customer service . Fast service , you will be in and out .. They give you a lot of oxtail gravy lol . The steam fish , fry chicken and oxtail is a must when you go there .
This restaurant serves a wide variety of delicious meals, my favorite is the steam fish. The food is good and the service is good. Will definitely recommend this restaurant.

Top of the hill restaurant, is the Best in the Bronx , there‚Äôs steam fish and fried chicken and their shrimp and pasta so delicious the chicken is very juicy and tender the steam fish just have enough spice to it , Go and check them out for yourself
This restaurant have the best steam fish in the Bronx That I tasted so far my wife and my self love to eat from this restaurant The customer service is really good the millers said that.
The best fish and oxtail I never eat , very friendly people I love their service
The food is exceptional !very tasty and well prepared go try out the fry chicken,rice and peas and you can choose among many menu options I highly recommend this place üòã‚Ä¶

This restaurant has the BEST FRIED CHICKEN I've ever tasted in New York, not to mention their oxtail and rice n peas, whether you're looking for a great lunch or not in the mood to cook dinner I WOULD RECOMMEND GOING TO TOP OF THE HILL RESTAURANT!!!!
Customer service at it's best. Tasty meals and reasonable pricing. Can't wait to try the other menu items.
